name: Gold Retriever
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Gold Retriever is the decentralized financial asset of the future. By combining the exponential growth opportunities of cryptocurrency with the stable reserve currency of gold, Gold Retriever represents decentralized financial freedom at its finest. Gold Retriever serves as the genesis token and key for the commodity ecosystem surrounding it.
